# Pre-Show Technical Checklist (Fillable)

Date: _______________________
Location: ____________________
Engineer/Producer: ___________

## Audio
- [ ] Mics connected and labeled.
- [ ] Input levels set (peak around -6 dB).
- [ ] Noise gate configured (if used).
- [ ] Headphone monitoring enabled.
- [ ] No echo/feedback present.

## Video
- [ ] Cameras framed and focused.
- [ ] Lighting balanced (key, fill, back).
- [ ] Overlays and lower thirds loaded.
- [ ] Scene transitions tested.

## Recording
- [ ] Local recording enabled.
- [ ] Recording path verified: _______________________
- [ ] Backup recording enabled.

## Network
- [ ] Wired connection (preferred).
- [ ] Upload speed tested: __________ Mbps
- [ ] RTMP endpoints verified.

## Streaming
- [ ] Titles/descriptions updated.
- [ ] Stream keys loaded.
- [ ] Go-live test performed.

Issues/Notes:
